TopicTitle: Official Weekly (Biweekly?) Spacecraft Exchange Showcase Thread

Articles.Content:
A lot of people want this out there as a way to promote community crafts, and I think it is a pretty good idea. As I'm pretty lazy, I decided to make this submission thread so that not only is it easier for me to browse submissions, but it will allow older crafts to be submitted (not on the front page anymore). There will be several basic categories each craft will be reviewed in. Also a word of advice, I tend to get sidetracked, so don't expect me to make totally professional reviews (Or get them done quickly) ._.

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ________________________________

First video of the Series!

See the rest of the series on my Youtube Channel!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrOtgaV9AspKUbn6tCxVcrA

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ______________________________

Check out the latest episode!

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ______________________________

Selection Rules:

1. Your craft must be stock. I will not make any reviews on modded craft. (Stock allows everyone to use your craft)

2. Your craft must be interesting. Make me amazed! Implement some new, crazy, or unique building techniques into your crafts to make them truly stand out.

3. Special features / Detailed Replicas increase your chances of being selected. (I want to see something that looks good and performs well. Stock rotors? Yes! Stock fairings? Cool! Stock turrets? Even more yes! Something that will make people gape in awe when they look it at. *Cough* Like maybe a Ratte with a working turret. *Cough* )

4. Craft will be chosen from the Spacecraft Exchange or this thread, whichever place you choose to publish your craft.

5. I will contact you via PM if I wish to use one of your crafts in a video. If you want any specific review style/focus points mention them there.

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ _____________________________

FACTS REGARDING VIDEOS:

My internet connection is quite poor, so it usually takes me a couple of hours to upload a video onto Youtube.

My videos will always be rendered in 1080p, 60fps. (Bonus points if you don't make me lag too badly)

It would be helpful to suggest they way you would want me to review the craft, as I only have so many good ideas before I start 'Splodin things.

I want to make this series a weekly thing, but due to extreme procrastination, it will probably be a biweekly series.

I am not the most professional reviewer out there, (think Danny2462 professional) so if you don't provide me with strict guidelines, I can't do a serious review other than maybe top-speed, maneuverability, and a full launch sequence.

Edited May 5, 2015 by astecarmyman
Damn, I've been having trouble making an original craft, it's been a long time even trying to make a replica. I really wish I could enter.

I'll submit my absurd aerobatic VTOL the Nomad A1, this thing is a hoot and deserves better video treatment than I can give it. Oh and it makes for beautiful crashes

Craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/li6j4vkz8kzn4a7/Nomad%20A1.craft?dl=0

Action Groups:

1. Vertical jet engines

2. Horizontal jet engines

3. Vertical engine bay doors

9. Vertical braking thrusters

Abort: Parachutes (can also use spacebar)

Stock parts, built for FAR but should work in stock.

How to fly it: Turn on SAS and RCS, hit action groups 1 and 2, go full throttle and fly it like you stole it!
